channel.title: How do i change the internal ip on a client
channel.description:
ok so i have this client that i downloaded and i want to use it for my server, the only problem is that there is not a space to insert your ip address (EXAMPLE.no-ip.biz or w/e) while this is good, it is also bad because i am unaware as to how to change it so that it tries to work with my server instead of the persons who i downloaded it from.
Please help if you can
-Adin
PS heres a picture of it
[img]http://i425.photobucket.com/albums/pp340/adinofaries/client.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do i change the internal ip on a client
item.dc:creator: @adin99 adin99
item.description:
@adin99 wrote:

de dust89:

Well, can I have the link to that client that you are using? because the client that I want has client.class not client.java so I can’t edit the IP

you will need a java decompiler

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the internal ip on a client
item.dc:creator: @adin99 adin99
item.description:
@adin99 wrote:

legend the hero:

Take out the ip address on the post.

Thanks it was just an example though

k0j0e:

Go in client.java then search for Server… and you will see a ip… delete it and put ur own ip there…

Ill try that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2008, 10:10:11 am[/size][hr]THANK YOU SO MUCH! :eek: you guys have been very helpful !!!

Read full topic

legend the hero:

By the way take out your i.p address (server i.p) it will get locked

item.title: How do i change the internal ip on a client
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

look in client.java and search for the i.p that it connects to and change it to tyour i.p.

By the way take out your i.p address (server i.p) it will get locked

Read full topic
